item.title: 4 astronauts return to Earth after being delayed by Boeing's capsule trouble and Hurricane Milton - The Associated Press
item.description:
1. 4 astronauts return to Earth after being delayed by Boeing's capsule trouble and Hurricane Milton  The Associated Press
  2. SpaceX’s Crew-8 Returns NASA Astronauts To Earth After 7 Months  Forbes
  3. Astronauts return to Earth after delay due to Boeing capsule snags  The Guardian
  4. Four space station fliers undock and head for Friday splashdown to wrap up extended mission  CBS News
  5. NASA astronauts depart space station after weather delays  NBC News

item.title: Astronauts return from nearly eight months in space after Starliner problems
item.description:
SpaceX capsule touches down carrying three Americans and a Russian who were scheduled to return in August

Four astronauts have returned to Earth after a nearly eight-month space station stay extended by Boeing’s capsule trouble and Hurricane Milton.

A SpaceX capsule carrying the crew parachuted before dawn on Friday into the Gulf of Mexico, just off the Florida coast, after undocking from the International Space Station earlier this week.

Continue reading...

item.description: The Kiwi K4 and H4 Boost battery head straps usually retail for $69.99 and $79.99, but Amazon has it on sale for $55.99 and $63.99 as of Oct. 25.
